alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 19 at 2:05PM PST until December 20 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...ADDITIONAL SNOW THROUGH MONDAY NIGHT FOR THE INLAND NORTHWEST... .Additional snowfall is expected for southeast Washington and central Idaho through Monday evening. Parts of the Cascade Mountains and mountain passes will see heavy snow during this time. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 6 inches. * WHERE...Holden Village, Stehekin, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
